mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PROJECT (CT_NO, PJ_NO, PJ_TITLE, PJ_PRICE, PJ_ST_DT, PJ_TERM, PJ_CATEGORY, PJ_DEADLINE, PJ_PLAN, PJ_SKILLS, PJ_MEETING, PJ_LOC, PJ_SUBLOC, PJ_CONTENT, PJ_SAVEDAY )
VALUES (client_seq.nextval, PROJECT_SEQ.nextval, #{pjTitle}, #{pjPrice}, #{pjSt_dt}, #{pjTerm}, #{pjCategory}, #{pjDeadline}, #{pjPlan}, #{pjSkills}, #{pjMeeting}, #{pjLoc}, #{pjSubloc}, #{pjContent}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT CT.CT_NAME CT_NAME,PJ.PJ_TITLE PJ_TITLE,PJ.PJ_ST_DT PJ_ST_DT, PJ.PJ_NO PJ_NO FROM PROJECT PJ, CLIENT CT WHERE PJ.CT_NO = CT.CT_NO and PJ.PJ_SAVECHECK=1
SELECT CT.CT_NAME CT_NAME,PJ.PJ_TITLE PJ_TITLE,PJ.PJ_ST_DT PJ_ST_DT,PJ.PJ_SAVECHECK PJ_SAVECHECK FROM PROJECT PJ, CLIENT CT WHERE PJ.CT_NO = CT.CT_NO and (PJ.PJ_SAVECHECK=2 or PJ.PJ_SAVECHECK=3)
